metadata.name: Poetry Of Madness
metadata.description:
I see a light
A light through your heart
The special heart glows in the dark
Warm me with your melodious heartbeat tonight
Sweetly kill the quietness of the night

Light the darkness
and let it shine in my heart
Light my way and let you be my start

The mystery of you lies within
The greatness of you releases my sin

Artwork resolution: 3840x6211
